content: needle to lift the wrap s and place them on the rh needle slip wrap s and unworked st back to lh needle purl all together through the back loop stretchy bind-off k2 *insert the left needle into the front of the 2 sts on the right needle and knit them together - 1 st remains on right needle k1* repeat between ** until all sts have been bound off directions toe using judy s magic cast on co 4 6 6 8 10 sts for the instep and 4 6 6 8 10 sts for the heel k one round dividing st between needles for dpns it is easiest to have your heel sts on repeat rnds 1-2 an additional 9 10 12 13 14 times then work round 1 one dpn and instep sts divided evenly divided between 2 dpns once more 66 72 84 90 96 sts total 44 48 56 60 64 st for - 2 3 3 4 5 sts on each dpn if you prefer using 5 dpns divide the heel and 22 24 28 30 32 for the instep both heel & instep sts evenly between the 4 worrking needles heel but be sure to remember which sts are your heel and instep for 2 you will be working back & forth on only the heel sts for this circulars or magic loop method each side will have 4 6 6 8 10 section st for all methods pm to indicate heel sts and beg of round row 1 rs k 32 35 41 44 47 w&t round 2 *kfb in the first st k to 2 sts before the end of the heel sts row 2 ws p 20 22 26 28 30 w&t kfb k1* repeat across instep sts 4 sts increase row 3 k to st before wrapped st w&t round 3 k all sts row 4 p to st before wrapped st w&t repeat rnds 2-3 an additional 8 8 10 10 10 times 44 48 56 60 repeat row 3-4 until 7 8 9 10 10 sts are wrapped on either 64 sts total 22 24 28 30 32 st for the heel and 22 24 28 30 side of the 8 8 10 10 12 center unwrapped sts rs should be 32 sts for the instep facing after working a row 4 22 ttooee uupp ssoocckkss you will work 1 round over both heel & instep sts as follows next round k to end of heel sts picking up wraps as you come to them then k across instep sts you should now be at the beginning of the heel sts heel flap you will be working back & forth on only the heel sts for this section row 1 rs k 32 35 41 44 47 sts picking up remaining wraps ssk turn 1 st decrease row 2 ws *sl1 p1* repeat between ** 10 11 13 14 15 times sl1 p2tog turn 1 st decrease
